Subsections.Subsection Title: 2.6 Earth work in excavation by mechanical means (Hydraulic excavator) / manual means over areas (exceeding 30cm in depth. 1.5m in width as well as 10 sqm on plan) including disposal of excavated earth, lead upto 50m and lift upto 1.5m, disposed earth to be levelled and neatly dressed.

Items.Item Description: Filling available excavated earth (excluding rock) in trenches, plinth, sides of foundations etc. in layers not exceeding 20cm in depth, consolidating each deposited layer by ramming and watering, lead up to 50 m and lift upto 1.5 m.

Subsections.Subsection Title: 4.1 Providing and laying in position cement concrete of specified grade excluding the cost of centring & shuttering all work upto plinth lvl.

Items.Item Description: 1:4:8 (1 cement: 4 coarse sand: 8 graded stone aggregate 40mm nominal size).

Subsections.Subsection Title: 5.2 Reinforced cement concrete work in wall (any thickness) including attached pilasters,buttresses, plinth and string courses, fillets, columns, pillars, piers, abutments, posts and struts etc. up to floor fivelevel excluding cost of centering, shuttering, finishing and reinforcement:

Items.Item Description: 1:1.5:3 (1 cement :1.5 coarse sand : 3 graded stone aggregate 20 mm. nominal size).

Subsections.Subsection Title: 5.9 Centring and shuttering including strutting , propping etc. and removal of form work for :

Items.Item Description: Foundations, footings, bases of columns, etc. for mass concrete
Lintels, beams, plinth beams, girders, bressumers and cantilevers
Columns, Pillars, Piers, Abutments, Posts and Struts

Subsections.Subsection Title: 5.22 Reinforcement for R.C.C. work including straightening, cutting, bending, placing in position and binding all complete.
6.4 Brick work with common burnt clay F.P.S. (non modular) bricks of class designation 7.5 in superstructure above plinth level up to floor V level in all shapes and sizes in :
6.13 Half brick masonry with common burnt clay F.P.S. (non modular) bricks of class designation 7.5 in superstructure above plinth level up to floor V level.
6.15 Extra for providing and placing in position 2 Nos. 6mm dia. M.S. bars at every third course of half brick masonry.

Items.Item Description: Extra for providing and placing in position 2 Nos. 6mm dia. M.S. bars at every third course of half brick masonry.

Subsections.Subsection Title: 13.2 15 mm cement plaster on the rough side of single or half brick wall of mix :
13.44 Finishing walls with water proofing cement paint of required shade :

Items.Item Description: New work (Two or more coats applied @ 3.84 kg/10 sqm).

Subsections.Subsection Title: 13.65 Painting with black anti-corrosive bitumastic paint of approved brand and manufacture to give an even shade:

Items.Item Description: Two or more coats on new work.

Subsections.Subsection Title: 16.11 Dry stone pitching 22.5 cm thick including supply of stones and preparing surface complete.

Items.Item Description: Dry stone pitching 22.5 cm thick including supply of stones and preparing surface complete.

Subsections.Subsection Title: 16.18 Fencing with angle iron post placed at required distance embedded in cement concrete blocks, every 15th post, last but one end post and corner post shall be strutted on both sides and end post on one side only and provided with horizontal lines and two diagonals interwoven with horizontal wires, of barbed wire weighing 9.38 kg per 100 m (minimum), between the two posts fitted and fixed with G.I. staples, turn buckles etc. complete. (Cost of posts, struts, earth work and concrete work to be paid for separately) :- Payment to be made per metre cost of total length of barbed wire used.

16.19 Supplying at site Angle iron post & strut of required size including bottom to be split and bent at right angle in opposite direction for 10 cm length and drilling holes upto 10 mm dia. etc. complete.

Items.Item Description: Supplying at site Angle iron post & strut of required size including bottom to be split and bent at right angle in opposite direction for 10 cm length and drilling holes upto 10 mm dia. etc. complete.
